data_table.description: Ultrasound Derived Data, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: T_CRIP41
variable.description: 1= for norm. 1st trans, >1 for subseq. [Ultrasound Derived Data, exam 4]

variable.name: CONTYR
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Ultrasound Derived Data, exam 4]

variable.name: QCREAD41
variable.description: 1 = if reg reading, >1 if rereading [Ultrasound Derived Data, exam 4]

variable.name: SP_STU41
variable.description: 0= for reg Vis.,>0 for spec., 22=compar [Ultrasound Derived Data, exam 4]

variable.name: CALIB
variable.description: Conversion factor [Ultrasound Derived Data, exam 4]

variable.name: QCCNT4
